mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.name as category_name, s.name as shop_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN shop s ON p.shop_id = s.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
SELECT p.*, c.name as category_name, s.name as shop_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN shop s ON p.shop_id = s.id ORDER BY p.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (shop_id, category_id, name, description, price, image) VALUES (#{shopId}, #{categoryId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{image})
